Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: (nabiyē!) niyata vaśayenma api kavsar (namæti apramāṇa sæpa sampat) obaṭa labā dī ættemu
(ohuṭa kṛtagna vīma piṇisa) oba, obagē deviyanva salāt kara, kurbāni dī, (parityāga karamin) siṭinu
niyata vaśayenma obava piḷikul karannā (kavurunda), ohuma paramparā daruvan nomætteki. (oba nova)
